# share

**Instance Property**

A reference to the share object that determines the share status of the record.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var share: CKRecord.Reference? { get }
```

## Discussion

CloudKit clears this property’s value when it deletes the corresponding [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKShare] object on the server. Send this record in the same batch operation as the share object you’re deleting, and this property updates accordingly.

CloudKit only supports sharing in zones with the `CKRecordZoneCapabilitySharing` capability. The default zone doesn’t support sharing.

If any records have a parent reference to this record, CloudKit implicitly shares them along with this record.



## Sharing Records

- **parent**: A reference to the record’s parent record.
- **CKRecord.Reference**: A relationship between two records in a record zone.
- **setParent(_:)**: Creates and sets a reference object for a parent from its record.
- **setParent(_:)**: Creates and sets a reference object for a parent from the parent’s record ID.
- **CKRecord.SystemFieldKey**: Possible values for types of system field keys on records.
